content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Setup
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0)
- Furnace 4 at position(6.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are stone furnaces used for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Smelting Setup
Uses the same furnaces as iron smelting (positions listed above) after iron smelting was completed

### Research Setup
Lab at position(10.5, 0.5) loaded with automation science packs, currently not operational due to lack of power

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items into entities
- Ensure required items are crafted or gathered before insertion attempts

### Errors when trying to craft items requiring assembling machines
- Items like copper cable and electronic circuits cannot be hand-crafted
- Need to set up assembling machines for automated production of these items

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure the entity is crafted and available in inventory before attempting placement
- Check recipe requirements and craft all necessary components first

### Errors when trying to craft items with missing ingredients
- Verify all required ingredients are available in inventory before crafting
- For items requiring multiple sub-components, ensure all sub-components can be crafted or are available

### Power-related issues
- Lab requires power to function
- Need to set up power generation system (steam engine, boiler, offshore pump)
- Ensure power connectivity between power producers and consumers
